compatibility.notes: PolyForm Noncommercial 1.0.0 is designed for noncommercial use only. Any commercial use or distribution is prohibited. Ensure compliance with the noncommercial clause when combining with other licenses.

key_requirements: Use is limited to noncommercial purposes.
Personal use for research, experimentation, and testing is permitted.
No sublicensing or transferring of licenses is allowed.
license.name: PolyForm-Noncommercial-1.0.0
obligations: You must agree to the terms as strict obligations.
You must provide a copy of the license or URL to the license with any distributed copies.
You must include any required notices provided by the licensor.
